hero.headline: Usability Assessment and Design for Production Optimization Software
hero.subtitle: INT's production optimization platform is used by operators in 80+ countries. We conducted comprehensive usability assessment and redesign, plus explored next-generation spatial computing interfaces.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: INT's production optimization platform is used by operators in 80+ countries. The software is powerful — but power had come at the cost of usability. Users struggled with complex workflows, inconsistent interfaces, and steep learning curves.

cards.title: Usability Debt
cards.description: Years of feature accumulation had created workflow complexity. Users struggled with task completion and navigation across the platform.

cards.title: Global User Base
cards.description: Operators across 80+ countries with varying technical literacy and cultural contexts. Design solutions needed universal usability.

cards.title: Future Vision
cards.description: Beyond fixing current issues, INT wanted to explore next-generation interfaces including spatial computing concepts.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We started with rigorous quantitative usability testing, then moved to evidence-based redesign and future exploration.

steps.title: Usability Assessment
steps.description: Task-based testing with representative users. Quantitative metrics: completion rates, time-on-task, errors.

steps.title: Prioritized Redesign
steps.description: Evidence-based improvement recommendations. Full UX/UI redesign targeting the highest-impact usability issues.

steps.title: Visual Consistency
steps.description: Symbol system and visual language consistency across the entire platform.

steps.title: Spatial Computing Exploration
steps.description: Vision Pro prototypes exploring next-generation interface paradigms for production optimization.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: From usability audit to redesign to spatial computing exploration — a comprehensive engagement spanning present optimization and future vision.

cards.title: Usability Testing
cards.description: Rigorous task-based testing generating quantitative metrics on completion rates, time-on-task, and error frequency.

cards.title: UI Redesign
cards.description: Full UX/UI redesign based on usability findings, optimizing workflows for common tasks.

cards.title: Symbol Systems
cards.description: Comprehensive visual language and symbol system ensuring consistency across the platform.

cards.title: Spatial Computing Concepts
cards.description: Vision Pro prototypes exploring how production optimization could work in spatial computing environments.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Data-driven insights that changed how INT understands user challenges, plus a vision for the future of their platform.

metrics.label: Countries Using Platform
metrics.description: Redesign benefits operators across INT's global user base.

metrics.label: Driven Insights
metrics.description: First-ever quantitative usability data on what's actually hard for users.

metrics.label: Spatial Computing Concepts
metrics.description: Next-generation interface prototypes exploring spatial computing paradigms.

testimonial.quote: We finally have data on what's actually hard for users, not just what we assumed was hard.
testimonial.author: Product Director
